label: EdgeNGramTokenFilter
description: Generates n-grams of the given size(s) starting from the front or the back of an input token. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Max Gram
fields.tooltip: The maximum n-gram length. Default is 2.

fields.label: Min Gram
fields.tooltip: The minimum n-gram length. Default is 1. Must be less than the value of maxGram.

fields.label: Side
fields.tooltip: Specifies which side of the input the n-gram should be generated from. Default is "front".
